rec_room.utils package¶

Submodules¶

rec_room.utils.colors module¶

class rec_room.utils.colors.Colors¶

Bases: object

Helper class defining RGB values and Opacity for standard colors.

These are the color options available for rendering charts/plots in the Recommender page. The values were taken from the chart.js JavaScript library, which is used in the Recommender page.

bg_colors¶

background colors

Type

list

br_colors¶

border colors

Type

list

bg_colors = ['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)']
br_colors = ['rgba(255, 99, 132, 1)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)']

Module contents¶

class rec_room.utils.Colors¶

Bases: object

Helper class defining RGB values and Opacity for standard colors.

These are the color options available for rendering charts/plots in the Recommender page. The values were taken from the chart.js JavaScript library, which is used in the Recommender page.

background colors

Type

list

br_colors¶

border colors

list

bg_colors = ['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)', 'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)', 'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)', 'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)', 'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)']
